system.notes: Standard helmet of the Sisters of Battle. Provides a Rebreather and Good Craftsmanship Photo-visor. Also provides +20 to Opposed Willpower Tests to Resist the effects of Psychic Techniques.

description.value: Standard helmet of the Sisters of Battle. Provides a Rebreather and Good Craftsmanship Photo-visor. Also provides +20 to Opposed Willpower Tests to Resist the effects of Psychic Techniques.
